step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders and wrists close to the target. Focus on slightly more consistent elbow positioning.
Excellent! Your shoulder and elbow alignment was very good. Continue to focus on keeping your wrists steady.
Good effort on squeezing your shoulder blades. Try to keep your wrists a bit more stable and your right elbow closer to the target.
Your shoulders were well-aligned. Work on keeping both elbows and wrists more consistently in position throughout the movement.
Great job maintaining good shoulder alignment. Focus on keeping your elbows and wrists more stable, especially your right elbow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms straight overhead and squeeze your shoulder blades together. Focus on making a fist and keeping your wrists steady for even better results.
